resources.string: Qala ukuxoxa ukuze uthumele izilumkiso zakho apha.
Kunye uthetha ibekwe, uzakuthumela kwi nto ekwalandelayo.
Louise nguMfundisi wesiSpayini okanye oza kukunceda ekwenzeni ukhuselekile kakuhle kwivakisela lakho!
Gabriel ngumfotografa waseFrance ondiza ekuthuthukiseni isi-Xhosa sakho!
Rakesh nguSiswekazi waseIndia esiFundiswa eUniversithi ekwakheka ukusiza nawe ukwenza iivakwebo zokubanzi!
Evelyn ngumfundi wethiyathaga endlwini yesigqibo eBhiritaniya ecina ukuncedisa kwiimvo zakho!
Ahsan nguMthengisi wesoftware kamagama okwakutshintshiza usisithe arkhasiwele!
uMin unemhimba yamaChina onelungiselelo olungakusiza ekwenzeni isikhala sakho!
